tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geospatial_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location GEOMETRY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE Locations (location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, latitude DECIMAL, longitude DECIMAL, name TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Services (service_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_id INT, service_name TEXT);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  city VARCHAR,
  country VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE geofences (
  geofence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  area GEOGRAPHY,
  center_latitude DECIMAL,
  center_longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE services (
  service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  service_name VARCHAR(50),
  provider_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  service_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES services(service_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)
